categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: Four-Eighteen was the designation of a stormtrooper who served in the Galactic Empire's Stormtrooper Corps during the Galactic Civil War between the New Republic and the Galactic Empire. In 6.5 ABY, the individual was killed by a booby-trap left by New Republic forces shortly after a raid intended to eliminate Rogue Squadron, an elite New Republic starfighter squadron, on the planet Talasea. Four-Eighteen's death, along with the death of fellow stormtrooper Four-Twenty, were later reported to Imperial Intelligence's agent Kirtan Loor.
The stormtrooper was first mentioned in the 1996 novel X-Wing: Rogue Squadron, written by Michael A. Stackpole.
